title: SEBI Developing AI-Powered Cybersecurity Tool For Market Entities
description: SEBI Chairman Tuhin Kanta Pandey on Friday said the capital markets regulator is in the process of developing an artificial intelligence-powered tool to analyse regulated entities' cyber safety preparedness. Speaking at the BSE here, Pandey also said SEBI is in the process of constituting a working group to develop a technology roadmap for market infrastructure institutions (MIIs).
content:

title: Schwarzman, OpenAI’s Brockman Boost $102 Million Trump War Chest
description: President Donald Trump’s super political action committee raised $102 million in the second half of 2025, fueled by eight-figure donations from artificial intelligence, cryptocurrency and finance industry figures, a tally that aims to boost Republicans’ efforts to retain control of Congress in crucial elections this year.

title: Grok says safeguard lapses led to images of 'minors in minimal clothing' on X
description: Elon Musk's xAI artificial intelligence chatbot Grok said on Friday lapses in safeguards had resulted in "images depicting minors in minimal clothing" on social media platform X and that improvements were being made to prevent this.

title: Currenc Group Announces Strategic Divestment of Controlling Interest in Tranglo to New Margin Holding for US$400 Million
description: SINGAPORE, Jan. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Currenc Group Inc. (Nasdaq: CURR) ('Currenc” or the 'Company”), a fintech pioneer empowering financial institutions worldwide with artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, today announced that its wholly owned subsidiary, Seamless Group Inc., has executed a definitive share purchase agreement to divest its 60% controlling interest in Tranglo Sdn. Bhd. ('Tranglo”) to New Margin Holding Limited. The transaction marks a pivotal milestone in the Company’s strategic transformation and value-unlocking initiatives.
